verses.name: Jeremiah 7:14
verses.text: Therefore will I do unto this house, which is called by my name, wherein ye trust, and unto the place which I gave to you and to your fathers, as I have done to Shiloh.

verses.name: Jeremiah 7:15
verses.text: And I will cast you out of my sight, as I have cast out all your brethren, even the whole seed of Ephraim.

verses.name: Jeremiah 7:16
verses.text: Therefore pray not thou for this people, neither lift up cry nor prayer for them, neither make intercession to me: for I will not hear thee.
